bill.title: Goveror's supplemental jobs budget funding provided; Department of Employment and Economic Development, Housing Finance Agency, and Workers' Compensation Court of Appeals funding provided; occupational and safety and health federal conformity changes made; Department of Commerce utility grid assessment extended; manufactured home relocation provisions modified; wage theft provisions adopted; and criminal and civil penalties established.
